title: Arrival and Check-In
description: Arrive in Las Vegas and settle into the luxurious resort.

activities.details: Enjoy a VIP check-in experience with a private concierge and welcome champagne.

activities.activity: Explore the Bellagio Conservatory & Botanical Gardens
activities.details: Take a stroll through the beautiful seasonal gardens.
Dine at the renowned Prime Steakhouse, overlooking the Bellagio fountains.

activities.activity: Watch the Fountains of Bellagio Show
activities.details: Enjoy the iconic water fountain show with synchronized music.

title: Luxury Shopping and Spa Day
description: Relax and indulge in the luxury amenities and shopping.

activities.details: Enjoy a delicious breakfast at Sadelle’s in the Bellagio.

activities.activity: Shopping at The Shops at Crystals
activities.details: Visit high-end stores such as Louis Vuitton, Gucci, and Chanel.

activities.activity: Spa Day at the Bellagio Spa
activities.details: Relax with a full-body massage, facial, and access to the spa’s steam rooms and hot tubs.
Dine on Mediterranean cuisine surrounded by Picasso artwork.

title: Adventure and Nightlife
description: Experience Vegas thrill rides and the famous nightlife.

activities.details: Start the day with a French-inspired breakfast at Aria.

activities.activity: Helicopter Tour of the Grand Canyon
activities.details: Take an exhilarating helicopter ride over the Grand Canyon with landing and lunch.
Unwind by the luxury poolside cabanas.
Enjoy an eclectic seafood menu with stunning decor.
Dance the night away at one of Vegas’ top nightclubs, Omnia, with VIP table service.

title: Art, Culture, and Fine Dining
description: Immerse in art installations and exclusive dining experiences.

activities.activity: Brunch at Lago by Julian Serrano
activities.details: Enjoy a lavish Italian brunch with views of the fountains.
Tour the museum dedicated to iconic Las Vegas signs and history.

activities.activity: Art Tour at the Aria Fine Art Collection
activities.details: Discover unique sculptures, paintings, and installations throughout the Aria property.
Experience fine dining at the only three Michelin-starred restaurant in Las Vegas.

title: Relax and Departure
description: End the trip on a relaxing note and prepare for departure.

activities.activity: Breakfast at The Buffet at Bellagio
activities.details: Savor a gourmet breakfast buffet with a variety of cuisines.

activities.activity: Last-minute Shopping at Fashion Show Mall
activities.details: Browse the latest collections and souvenirs before heading home.

activities.activity: Return to the hotel for checkout
activities.details: Check out of Bellagio and head to the airport.
Fly back home, concluding your luxury Vegas experience.
